TC.Desc: ReadTC001 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Structure Size = 49
ReadTC002 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Structure Size is less than 49
ReadTC003 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Structure Size is greater than 49
ReadTC004 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Structure Size = 0
ReadTC006 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Padding = 255
ReadTC007 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Padding = 0
ReadTC008 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Reserved = 0
ReadTC010 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Reserved = 10
ReadTC011 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Length = 0
ReadTC012 This test case is to verify the server behaviour for valid Length (Length = 50)
ReadTC014 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Length = 1
ReadTC015 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Length > File size, File size = 50 KB
ReadTC016 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Offset = 0, "Offset + Length" less than File size, File size = 1 Mb
ReadTC017 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Offset = 0, Length = File size, File size = 50 KB
ReadTC018 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Offset = 0, Length = File size, File size = 512 Bytes (File size less than 1 Kb)
ReadTC019 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Offset = 0, "Offset + Length" = File size, File size = 50 Kb (File size more than 1 Kb and less than 65 Kb)
ReadTC021 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Offset > File size (Offset = 51300, File size = 50 KB)
ReadTC022 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Offset = EOF, Length = 10, File size = 50 KB
ReadTC024 This test case is to verify the server behaviour for valid File Id
ReadTC025 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when File Id = 0
ReadTC026 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when File Id = 0x00000000FFFFFFFF
ReadTC027 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when File Id = 0xFFFFFFFF00000000
ReadTC028 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when File Id = 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF
ReadTC029 This test case is to verify the server behaviour while reading large files with MTU support (set Length = 2 Mb)
ReadTC030 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when MininumCount = 0
ReadTC031 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when FileSize > "Offset+Length" > MinimumCOunt > 0 (FileSize = 50 KB)
ReadTC032 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when FileSize > "Offset+Length" > MinimumCount > 0 (FileSize = 50 KB)
ReadTC034 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when MinimumCount > Length (MinimumCount = 2, Length = 1 byte)
ReadTC035 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when MinimumCount > File size (MinimumCount = 1000, File size = 512 Bytes, Length = 100)
ReadTC036 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when MinimumCount > File size (MinimumCount = 2, File = Empty file, Length = 0)
ReadTC037 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Channel = 0
ReadTC038 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Channel > 0
ReadTC039 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when RemainingBytes > 0
ReadTC041 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when RemainingBytes = Arbitrarily large positive value (15 Mb) (FileSize = 10 Mb)
ReadTC042 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when RemainingBytes = 0
ReadTC043 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when ReadChannelInfoOffset = 0 (only for SMB2 or SMB2.1)
ReadTC044 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when ReadChannelInfoOffset > 0 (only for SMB2 or SMB2.1)
ReadTC045 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when ReadChannelInfoLength = 0 (only for SMB2 or SMB2.1)
ReadTC046 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when ReadChannelInfoLength > 0 (only for SMB2 or SMB2.1)
ReadTC047 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Buffer = 0
ReadTC048 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Buffer > 0
ReadTC049 This test case is to verify the server behaviour while reading an Empty file
ReadTC050 This test case is to verify the server behaviour while reading an Empty file with non-zero MinimumCount
ReadTC051 This test case is to verify the server behaviour while reading an Sparse file (FileSize = 1 Mb, Length = 200, Offset = 500)
ReadTC052 This test case is to verify the server behaviour while reading an Sparse file (FileSize = 50 KB, Length = 51200, Offset = 0)
ReadTC053 This test case is to verify the server behaviour when Offset = 0, Length = File size, File size = 128 KB
ReadTC054 This test case is to verify the server behaviour while reading large files with MTU support (set Length = 1 Mb)
